casebody.data:
Irma PINTO, Petitioner-Petitioner,
v.
BOARD OF TRUSTEES, PUBLIC EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT SYSTEM, Respondent-Respondent. C-391 September Term 2017
079977 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 8, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003263-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
